title: Urbanization in Nigeria 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 46.98 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Share of urban population in total population, of value 45.25 was reported at Year 2012
min_summary: In general Share of urban population in total population has stayed the same over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014.
